properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Standing on the promises of Christ my King, Through eternal ages let His praises ring! Glory in the highest I will shout and sing Standing on the promises of God!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Standing, Standing, Standing on the promises of God, my Savior. Standing, Standing, I’m standing on the promises of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Standing on the promises that cannot fail, When the howling storms of doubt and fear assail, By the living word of God I shall prevail Standing on the promises of God!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Standing on the promises of Christ the Lord, Bound to Him eternally by love’s strong cord, Overcoming daily with the Spirit’s sword Standing on the promises of God!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Standing on the promises I cannot fall Listening every moment to the Spirit’s call Resting in my Savior as my all in all Standing on the promises of God!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Standing on the promises, I cannot fall Listening every moment to the Spirit’s call Resting on my Savior as my All in all Standing on the promises of God.{/lang-eng}
